LanguageData.regen_text: Regenerates terrain on the currently loaded map so you can get flooding, tides, and/or an oasis in a save made before this mod was added. After saving this setting, make a new save file for your game (in case things go badly), then reload the game. Once you reload, UNCHECK T{PAWN_possessive} BOX.
